B

begin() - Method in class DotStar
Starts the SPI connection.

C

clear() - Method in class DotStar
Sets all pixels to OFF.

D

DotStar - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is used for controlling a Dotstar LED strip on a Rapberry Pi.
DotStar(int) - Constructor for class DotStar
Constructs a Dotstar object with a blue-green-red order.
DotStar(int, String) - Constructor for class DotStar
Constructs a Dotstar object with a specified order.

F

fill(int, int, int) - Method in class DotStar
Sets all pixels to the specified RGB value.

S

setBrightness(int) - Method in class DotStar
Adjust output brightness.
setColorOrder(String) - Method in class DotStar
Sets the indeces of each byte in the 3 byte pixel.
setPixelColor(int, int, int, int) - Method in class DotStar
Sets specified pixel to specified RGB value.
show() - Method in class DotStar
Sends the stored pixel values to the strip.

U

updateLength(int) - Method in class DotStar
Change the length of the DotStar strip.
